title: Problem with ping during games
body:
Lately since the last patch, maybe two, my connection has been lagging. Normally my ping is about 5-15 but lately it's been bottoming at about 40 and jumping to 100-200 whenever anything happens in game. I have run speed tests several times and I do not believe the problem is on my end. I also know that other people have recently had more issues with ping and lagging but I cannot prove it.

Thanks

replies.body:
If this high ping happens in every game you try to play, it could be a sign that your network connection is taking a less than adequate route on it's way to our game servers. When this happens, it can cause your ping to spike and you'll see delays between your input and when the champion reacts. 

Let's first go through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can patch up your connection on your end. Let me know if you have any questions.
